text: Mariyu (o pravakta!) Allah anugraham mariyu ayana karunyame nipai lekunte, variloni oka vargam varu ninnu margabhrastatvaniki guri ceyagoraru. Kani varu tamanu tamu tappa marevvarini margabhrastuluga ceyaleru. Mariyu varu ni kelanti hani ceyaleru. Mariyu allah ni pai i granthanni mariyu vivekanni avatarimpajesadu. Mariyu niku teliyani visayalanu niku nerpadu. Mariyu ni pai unna allah anugraham cala goppadi
